description: # How to use: Same as the normal S-Cam, just keep cycling through the modes till you reach the modes I added! ## Features: -New camera modes -Hides your mouse pointer! -Ability to change the roll of all camera modes -Many many settings -Compatible with multiplayer™™™ ## New Modes: -Ace Combat This camera mode tries to keep your aircraft and the closest aircraft/your locked target in the frame at once. Good for dogfights/recreating scenes from your favourite fighter jet anime! -TGP Now the TPG can be recorded with ease! -Smoothed TGP A smoothed version of the TGP so you can pretend you have a drone! -HUD Mode Now the HUD can be recorded with ease! -External Camera Allows you to film the external camera angles from the Cam menu on the MFDs -Free Camera A free camera that can be controlled with the keyboard and mouse. WASD to move, shift to move faster and left-click to cycle FoVs -Smooth Zoom A camera mode that is the same as the normal smooth S-Cam mode, except when you look at a vehicle it will zoom in on it! I plan to add more modes in updates! @ me if there's any more modes you want
name: S Cam Plus
tagline: Adds more modes to the existing S-Cam!
